entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
